org.bluezoo.gumdrop.quota.QuotaManager

  • Packages that use QuotaManager 
    Package Description
    org.bluezoo.gumdrop.ftp
    FTP (File Transfer Protocol) server implementation.
    org.bluezoo.gumdrop.ftp.file
    Filesystem-based FTP handler implementations.
    org.bluezoo.gumdrop.imap
    IMAP4rev2 server implementation for Gumdrop.
    org.bluezoo.gumdrop.imap.handler
    Handler interfaces for the IMAP server.
    org.bluezoo.gumdrop.quota
    Storage quota management for Gumdrop services.

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      default QuotaManager FTPConnectionHandler.getQuotaManager()
      Gets the quota manager for this handler, if quota enforcement is enabled.
